The colleagues had a great time chatting and bonding over the delicious food and drinks. However, when the time came for the party to end, one of the colleagues, John, quickly leaves without thanking the host for the invitation. This behavior causes confusion and awkwardness amongst the remaining colleagues, as the cultural norm in China is to express gratitude for the invitation and the opportunity to spend time with the host by saying """"谢谢你的邀请"". 主人： 没问题，你快走吧
